com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.interfaces

Interface SendBridge

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface SendBridge
    This Class is used to abstract away the Send-mechanism.

    It decouples the sender and the sending Session, whilst still maintaining the possibility to send something over the DefaultConnection.

    With that you can change the target of sending using the strategy pattern. By providing an Setter for the SendBridge the sender may be changed at runtime.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Session.send(Object), Client.send(Object)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(Object o)
      This call will send the Object o over the DefaultConnection of the internally registered Sender.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(Object o)
        This call will send the Object o over the DefaultConnection of the internally registered Sender.
        Parameters:
        o - the Object, that should be send.
